description: Core service implementation depends on the interface definition.
Unit tests for the core service can only be written after the service is implemented.
mitigation_plan: Develop tests in parallel against the interface contract using mocks.
impact_if_delayed: Delays validation of the core transformation engine.

description: Tests for sandbox constraints require the sandbox to be implemented first.
The migration procedure documentation and testing can only happen after the migration script is developed.
mitigation_plan: Begin documentation based on the script's design in parallel to development.
